Marmalade Sandwich (for Female)
kDesc
Not only have you helped Lucy, you've contributed to the community score! That deserves a sandwich. [#Legal]
Tu as non seulement aidé Lucie et contribué au score de la communauté ! Ca mérite un sandwich. [#Legal]
Du hast nicht nur Lucy geholfen, du hast auch Punkte für die Community gewonnen! Diesen Toast hast du dir verdient. [#Legal]
Non solo hai aiutato Lucy, ma hai anche dato il tuo contributo al punteggio della community! È proprio un sandwich meritato. [#Legal]
No solamente has ayudado a Lucy, ¡también has contribuido a la puntuación de la comunidad! Eso se merece un sándwich. [#Legal]
ルーシーを助けるじゃなく、コミュニティースコアにも貢献してくれましたね！これがその報酬です！ [#Legal]
루시를 도와주었을뿐 아니라 커뮤니티 점수에도 기여를 했군요. 샌드위치를 즐길 자격이 있습니다. [#Legal]
Not only have you helped Lucy, you've contributed to the community score! That deserves a sandwich. [#Legal]
你不但幫露西忙，還幫整個社群加分！所以我們送上三明治。 [#Legal]
你不但幫露西忙，還幫整個社群加分！所以我們送上三明治。 [#Legal]
Not only have you helped Lucy, you've contributed to the community score! That deserves a sandwich. [#Legal]
